table.name: ship_unit_line
table.description: SHIP_UNIT_LINE stores line item information for an order release. It is a parallel table to S_SHIP_UNIT_LINE.

columns.name: SHIP_UNIT_GID
columns.description: The GID for the ship unit associated with the order release.

columns.name: SHIP_UNIT_LINE_NO
columns.description: The unique sequence within the ship unit to define the individual line items.

columns.name: ORDER_RELEASE_LINE_GID
columns.description: The order release line associated with this ship unit line content line items.

columns.name: WEIGHT
columns.description: The gross weight of the item.

columns.name: WEIGHT_UOM_CODE
columns.description: The unit of measure for gross weight column.

columns.name: WEIGHT_BASE
columns.description: The gross weight in base units.

columns.name: VOLUME
columns.description: The gross volume of the item.

columns.name: VOLUME_UOM_CODE
columns.description: The unit of measure for the gross volume.

columns.name: VOLUME_BASE
columns.description: The gross volume in base units.

columns.name: ITEM_PACKAGE_COUNT
columns.description: The number of packages in this order release ship unit line for one ship unit. Its ship unit may represent more than one same ship units. E.g., for 20 ship units that contains 4 cases of 24 cans of cocoa, each order release ship unit line row will have an item GID: cocoa, item count 4x24, item package specification: case-of-24-cans, item package count: 4. The ship unit count will be 20.

columns.name: OB_LINE_GID
columns.description: The order base line associated with this ship unit line content line items if the order release was built from the order base.

columns.name: WEIGHT_PER_SHIP_UNIT
columns.description: The weight per shipping line count to handle shipping a multiple count.

columns.name: WEIGHT_PER_SHIP_UNIT_UOM_CODE
columns.description: The weight per unit of measure.

columns.name: WEIGHT_PER_SHIP_UNIT_BASE
columns.description: The weight per in the base unit of measure.

columns.name: VOLUME_PER_SHIP_UNIT
columns.description: The weight per shipping line count to handle shipping a multiple count.

columns.name: VOLUME_PER_SHIP_UNIT_UOM_CODE
columns.description: The weight per unit of measure.

columns.name: VOLUME_PER_SHIP_UNIT_BASE
columns.description: The weight per in the base unit of measure.

columns.name: COUNT_PER_SHIP_UNIT
columns.description: The count per ship unit.

columns.name: PACKAGING_UNIT_GID
columns.description: The GID for the packaging unit that is related to the shipment line.

columns.name: PACKAGING_UNIT_COUNT
columns.description: The packaging unit count for the packaged unit that is being shipped.

columns.name: SECONDARY_WEIGHT
columns.description: An additional value for the secondary weight of the item.

columns.name: SECONDARY_WEIGHT_UOM_CODE
columns.description: The nit of measure for secondary weight column.

columns.name: SECONDARY_WEIGHT_BASE
columns.description: The secondary weight in base units.

columns.name: SECONDARY_VOLUME
columns.description: As additional value for the secondary volume of the item.

columns.name: SECONDARY_VOLUME_UOM_CODE
columns.description: Unit of measure for the secondary volume.

columns.name: SECONDARY_VOLUME_BASE
columns.description: The secondary volume in base units.

columns.name: NET_WEIGHT
columns.description: The net weight of the item.

columns.name: NET_WEIGHT_UOM_CODE
columns.description: Unit of measure for net weight column.

columns.name: NET_WEIGHT_BASE
columns.description: The net weight in base units.

columns.name: NET_VOLUME
columns.description: The net volume of the item.

columns.name: NET_VOLUME_UOM_CODE
columns.description: The unit of measure for the net volume.

columns.name: NET_VOLUME_BASE
columns.description: The net volume in base units.

columns.name: SECONDRY_NET_WEIGHT
columns.description: An additional value for the secondary net weight of the item.

columns.name: SECONDRY_NET_WEIGHT_UOM_CODE
columns.description: Unit of measure for secondary net weight column.

columns.name: SECONDRY_NET_WEIGHT_BASE
columns.description: The secondary net weight in base units.

columns.name: SECONDRY_NET_VOLUME
columns.description: As additional value for the net secondary volume of the item.

columns.name: SECONDRY_NET_VOLUME_UOM_CODE
columns.description: The unit of measure for the net secondary volume.

columns.name: SECONDRY_NET_VOLUME_BASE
columns.description: The secondary net volume in base units.

columns.name: OB_LINE_RELEASE_INSTR_SEQ
columns.description: The release instruction identifier from the order base line if the ship unit line was constructed through the order base releasing logic.

columns.name: DOMAIN_NAME
columns.description: Database domain where this data is stored.

columns.name: INSERT_USER
columns.description: The user ID of the data insert user.

columns.name: INSERT_DATE
columns.description: Date and time of data insert.

columns.name: UPDATE_USER
columns.description: The user ID of the data update user.

columns.name: UPDATE_DATE
columns.description: Date and time of the most recent data update.

columns.name: PACKAGED_ITEM_GID
columns.description: The packaged item GID defining the line for the ship unit.
